name: Soul Fog
description:
Description

Explore the Fog, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot'em all up!

In a time of gun and spear, the magical gem that maintains the balance of the Universe is stolen by high-tech monsters. The universe is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical gem…

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some monster minions!

Downloads

1+ on Windows XD

The controls are simple Move WASD Shoot / Aim Left / Right Mouse Button JumpSpace BarInteractE
 DropQ
ReloadR
